item.title: Layer Your Surface Patterns
item.description: While there are many pattern layouts you can choose for your surface pattern designs, one of the most impressive is the multi layered surface pattern. In this post I will cover the advantages of and instructions for successfully completing a layered repeating pattern. Why layer your patterns? While single layer patterns can look elegant, beautiful and are often the right look for your purposes, sometimes they can appear flat, uninspired and have clearly noticeable repeats.
